keywords: convenience@serve with salad for complete meal
subtitle: These tasty burgers can be quickly made from store-cupboard ingredients and are an ideal way to use up leftover mashed potato.

method.text: Heat the oil in a frying pan. Add the salad onions and pepper and fry for 2-3 min or until softened. Remove from heat. Leave to cool.
In a large bowl, mix together the mashed potato, salmon, lemon juice and lemon rind, seasoning and salad onion and pepper mixture.
Divide mixture into equal-sized portions. Shape each into a burger shape. Lightly dust each in a little flour to prevent excess stickiness. Dip the burgers in the sesame seeds. Chill for 30 min.
Heat a little oil in a frying pan. Cook the first batch for 5 min on each side until lightly browned. Remove from pan and keep warm while cooking the remainder.

title: Sesame coated salmon burgers
